initial_prompts.name: create_initial_file
initial_prompts.prompt: Create a file called 'design/initial-test.txt' with content 'Initial prompt executed successfully at $(date)'. Then exit.

loop_prompts.name: create_loop_file
loop_prompts.prompt: Create a file called 'design/loop-test.txt' with content 'Loop prompt executed at $(date)'. Then create an empty file called 'design/TEST_DONE' to signal completion.

end_prompts.name: create_final_file
end_prompts.prompt: Create a file called 'design/final-test.txt' with content 'End prompt executed successfully at $(date). Test completed.'
